lead_paragraph: GRILL--Harold. Loving husband of Libby, father of Lisa Herrnson (Lev) and David Grill (Ricki), grandfather of Sam, Alana, Jake and Jesse. School principal and civil servant, veteran and tennis lover. 1/3
